reviews.comments: Excelente departamento, muy bien ubicado. Tiene todo lo necesario para estar muy comodo, te reciben de primera y muy atentos ante cualquier pedido. El departamento es muy lindo, luminoso, con terraza y todo equipado con cosas de primera.
excelente departamento
Hermoso departamento. Muy acogedor, la ubicación muy buena. Altamente recomendable.
El departamento es bueno y está muy bien ubicado. Pero no he podido comunicarme con el anfitrión y eso ha hecho que pierda un vuelo.
reviews.response: Hola Sebastian, que lastima tu comentario, te cuento que yo personalmente te explique muy precisamente como salir solo del departamento (como lo he hecho con las otras 100 personas), se ve que no entendiste bien (  la única persona que no entiende) y me llamaste 10 veces un domingo a las 5am, te pido perdon si no escuche el celular a esa hora.

reviews.comments: El lugar es muy bueno, Julien fue muy atento. Las fotos son reales, y la ubicación perfecta para lo que queríamos hacer. Volvería sin dudas.
Excelentes anfitriones y el departamento hermoso y bien ubicado. Cien x ciento recomendable.
Excelente como siempre!
Muy lindo y cómodo!
Excelente como siempre!
Excelente!

Espectacular atención de Julien. Disponible siempre y dandonos opciones para nuestros proximos viajes a Buenos Aires. Su trato fue de primera. El Departamento esta impecable, luminoso, accesible, limpio, con una cama amplia y comoda, etc, etc... todo para felicitar, disfrutar y regresar sin dudas. Muchas gracias por todo!!
Todo excelente!
La casa de los chicos es hermosa. Muy atentos. Todo de 10! :-) - 5 stars!!!

El departamento es precioso, tal como lo muestran las fotos. Absolutamente limpio, completo, cuidado y confortable. La zona súper bien conectada. Julien nos recibió con familiaridad y buena onda, estando pendiente de que estuviéramos cómodos. Nada que objetar. Todo a favor. Pasamos unos días preciosos. Volveremos! Gracias!!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Ana, ustedes fueron unos huespedes 10 puntos!

reviews.comments: El departamento es precioso! Muy buena comunicación con Julien, super atento a como estábamos. Hermoso piso con luz casi en la copa de los arboles. Super recomendable!

Hermoso departamente en excelente ubicación. Toallas y sábanas de primera calidad. Decorado elegantemente, limpio, confortable y muy completo, tiene todo lo necesario. Julien ha sido un anfitrión genial
Todo 10 puntos . Volvería!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tu bonito comentario Diana!

reviews.comments: Muy recomendable, super lindo y excelente ubicación!

Mi estadia en el departamento de Julien & Sol fue muy buena. Fueron muy buenos comunicandose conmigo, teninedo en cuenta mis necesidades para ingresar al lugar. El check-in fue facil y todo estuvo organizado tal cual fue acordado. El departamento esta muy bien ubicado cerca de varios negocios de ropa, restaurantes y bares. La decoracion del lugar es muy linda y con muy buen gusto. El departamento tiene mucha luz y es muy acojedor.
Excelente lugar. Volvería encantado. Gracias
Me gustó mucho el departamento, bien ubicado, amplio, tal cual se ve en las fotos. 100% recomendable.
Correcto

Muy buena experiencia, 100% recomendable. El departamento es tal cual se muestra en las fotos. 
Agradecemos mucho la disponibilidad de Julien y Sol para ayudarnos en lo que necesitamos durante nuestra estadía.

Gracias!

El departamento de Julien y Sol es fantástico, muy iluminado, bien ubicado y amueblado y cuidando todos los detalles para tener una estancia agradable. Las personas que nos atendieron con trato maravilloso; es una experiencia para repetir. Muchas gracias.
El barrio muy central y lleno de panoramas. El depto perfecto y en buen estado y la atención de Julien fue muy buena.

Julien! 
Muchas gracias por todo, eres un chico muy majo. La casa estaba impecable y ha superado mis expectativas.
Las recomendaciones que me distes han sido estupendas (seguro que no quieres ser guía turístico? Jejejej). Espero poder volver con mi esposa pronto!
La ubicación del piso muy buena, el metro está a 2'. El apartamento es muy acogedor y cómodo. Julien a sido un gran anfitrión. Incluso me ayudo con el transporte de/al aeropuerto.
Excelente estadía, tal como se ve en las fotos, muy buena ubicación, edificio seguro y tranquilo.

The apt is exactly as the photos, means great! It's really confortable and nice place to stay, in the heart of Palermo's neighborhood, easy to access to and from the rest of the city. Julien was great and easy to communicate with. I'll recommend everyone to rent his apt :)
The apartment is in a great location - very centrally located to a very nice neighborhood and a short walk from less touristy areas as well.

Excellently maintained and located apartment in Palermo! 

Julien and Sol are very responsive to all information requests prior to the stay and provide a very helpful booklet recommending various restaurants and bars in the area. 

Thanks for a great stay.
Jason
awesome apartment in heart of coolest hood in BA. would definitely stay here again. thanks guys!
Lovely apartment, very nicely decorated!
Good flat in great location, very close to the tube and in great neighborhood.

Clean place in the middle of Palermo with easy access to restaurants, convenience stores, the mall and even a gelato spot right outside! We also enjoyed that they had pots and pans for cooking breakfast if you wanted. Lastly we appreciated how fast they were in the response time as we had small issue in checking in since we didn’t have WiFi when first getting there. All in all - good spot.

Julien's place in Palermo was amazing! We loved the area and the apartment itself was gorgeous, really clean and well looked after. We enjoyed being in the apartment as much as exploring around it and thought everything about the booking and arrival/departure was really well organised and high quality. Palermo is the best area, there is so much to do and great restaurants to eat at, which Julien recommended. We would definitely come back.
Very stylish flat in a perfect location. Julien did everything to make our stay very enjoyable. Highly recommend it!

Outstanding experience. The place is just as clean and cozy as it appears to be in the pictures. The check in and check out process was very simple. The hosts did a great job communicating during our entire stay. I’m a very picky person, and I would definitely recommend.

The place is exactly as described : great location, very walkable in a nice area close to all the restaurants without being in the midst of the buzz. Would recommend to anyone looking for a great little place to stay.

Beautuful apartment. The bed was very comfortable. Julian & Sol arranged for me to get from the airport and the check in/check out process was seemless. The area is amazing. Very hip and lively with tons of resturants bars and even a park a near by park. I would stay there again in a hearbeat.

Julien & Sol's apartment in Palermo Soho is charming and wonderfully located. The rooms are as spacious and comfortable as the pictures suggest. The bathroom was very clean. The apartment is within walking distance of many great restaurants, bars, and shops, and taxis were easy to find, when necessary. The street is generally quiet and we always felt safe at any time of day. While we never met them, our hosts were very easy to work with and accommodating of our schedule for check-in and check-out.
Great communication! Completely agree with other guests nice comments.
Excellent location, super attentive host, very clean and modern apartment - we had a great time!

Had a great stay! The apartment is neat and clean and the location is great to get away from the busy BA center but close to the restaurants and bars Palermo area. Check in and check out was very convenient and questions were answered very fast. Would definitely recommend!

Olá, agradecemos a estadia, apartamento limpo e organizado. Super indicamos! 
Gratos,
Virgínia e Moisés Teles
Well located, simply and stylishly furnished with some useful local tips for restaurants and bars.

Julien and Sol where amazing hosts. We flew in from Australia with little Spanish. They organised an airport transfer and had someone waiting at the apartment for checkin and to help us settle in. Julien left some really great local reccomendations which we checked out and loved! The apartment itself is in a really great location in Palermo which is a really great suburb with a lot of great boutique food and drink places, great vibe and a little upmarket feel. The apartment is as the pictures show, small and tidy everything you need. The only negative is that the walls and windows must be quite thin, he noise from the street is quite loud - but maybe what you would expect for the location. Everything is very secure!
Thanks again Julien and Sol we appreciated everything you did for us!

The apartment is nice and clean, though some of the furniture such as wardrobes are IKEA like flimsy. 
The kitchen is not very well equipped. If you are planning on any kind of cocking you will run into trouble! No knives what so ever to cut bread, meat or even chop an onion. Cutting board, nope. One, as in one! wine glass and so on... 
This apartment is 10-15 minute walk from Palermo, its not close to any hip restaurants, bars or anything like it. Sadly enough the supermarkets within 10 minute walk radius are not up to par with todays expectations. 
Would I stay here again? No!
reviews.response:
Hi Pontus, we are very sorry about the wine glasses and kitchen equipment ( when people broke glasses they don't let us know...) regarding the 10-15 min walking is very funny, if you know how to use (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) maps, you will
See that is right in the middle of Palermo  and you are 6 minutes walking to Don Julio which is the top restaurant in BA. I think you missed the guide we left to all our guest, which I had NEVER a complain about the location. The next time, instead of asking for early check in and late check out ( for free) and when you leave , write this unfair review, you better ask you host about the city , and I will explain you where to go.

reviews.comments: Place is exactly as described. Julien and Sol were great with accommodating my early check in since we had a red-eye in from Lima the night before. The place is super spacious and all the amenities work great. It's also within walking distances of a bunch of great bars and restaurants so going back and forth is a breeze. I was there for my anniversary with my husband (we are both late 20s early 30s) and it was a great home base for us! Thank you for a great first AirBNB experience :)
Great spot in BAs coolest barrio, just far enough off the main drag to be a quiet sleep. Very clean. Being your own coffee.
Great place. Well located to explore a great part of BA. Julien was very helpful for check-in and general tips/experience. Would highly recommend

This is a lovely little apartment, lots of light and very clean. It's in a great location, cute little bars and restaurants very close and easy to get to public transport. Julien was a great host, organized an airport pickup which was very helpful, and was very flexible with us checking out. Would definitely stay here again!
Palermo is an awesome area - it heaves until the early hours! Julien gave us some great recommendations for restaurants and cafes. We felt very secure and at home in the house.

Sol & Julien are very attentive and helpful hosts. Their place was light and airy and very well located. The bed is huge and very comfortable. I also appreciated the toiletries that were available. Would love to stay here again!

A great apartment and in a great location. Only five or so minutes walk to the Subte and within ten minutes or less of a whole host of great shops, bars and restaurants.
The apartment is perfect and provided for all our needs, it's exactly as described. Julien was the perfect host too, communication with him was very good. He met us in check in and again in check out. We would definitely stay here again.

A lovely, smart, clean apartment in a great location close to the bars and restaurants of Palermo.
A 5 minute walk to the Subte to access the other barrios.
Excellent communication with the hosts, and extremely helpful!
Highly recommended.

From booking to check-out this was an excellent experience. The apartment is as cute in real life as it is in the photos. It is very clean, tidy and secure and is located in a beautiful neighborhood away from the tourists.
Понравилось! Спокойно и приятно! Очень приятный и отзывчивый хозяин.

This is a great apartment in Palermo.  Walking distance to great restaurants and bars.  Very clean and well maintained, felt like home after a week staying there.  Julien was more than generous with recommendations and extremely accommodating and responsive with checking in and out.  Overall fanstastic experience here.

I haven't meet Julien while we were in BSAS. But his friend helped us with everything, we could stay a little longer, could leave our bags for a couple of hours.
The apartment looks exactly like on the pictures. Subte and collectivos are nearby. Shops and restaurant around 10 minutes walking distance.
If you have some problems with noise you should know it is quite loud in the streets and even with the windows closed you can hear it
in the apartment.
Anyway there is so much to explore at night you probably won't be in bed too early!

I'll start with the balcony.  Plenty of room for breakfast al fresco.  The balcony, on the 6th floor, is like being in a tree-house as it is in the canopy of a big tree but also open on one side to long views of blue sky.

The apartment is phenomenal.  I've stayed in 20+ AirBnBs and this one ranks in the top.

One feature, which I have not seen in any of the others:  live plants, giving it a real at-home feel.

And the space is huge by any standard.

The apartment is convenient to bus lines and Metro.  Taxis are always on the street and there is fast Uber service.

And it is walk-able to the zoo as well as many of the major sites such as National Museum of Decorative Arts (recommended) and MALBA.  These are not short strolls but, still, very walk-able in a beautiful part of the city.

It is a hundred or so pesos' taxi ride to the main shopping areas such as Cordoba and Florida Avenues and Galleria Pacifico (also recommend)

There is a small corner market/grocery shop two doors away and more places for dinner than I could even count

Julien and Sol also checked in via text during the stay and they also have a third person to meet and greet.  Juan, the greeter, couldn't have been more pleasant and helpful.  He, too, checked in during the stay.

If/when I come back to Buenos Aires, this will be my first choice.  There is no reason to look anywhere else.

We had an absolutely fantastic stay! The communication was top notch, and the location was incredible. Close to Palermo subway station and within 10 minutes of some of he best dining and nightlife in BA! Wifi was great. Highly recommend. We would stay here again.

We had a fabulous time at Julien & Sol's place. We liked the location when we booked it, and were pleasantly surprised to find even more transportation options a mere 5 minute walk from the apartment. We were met by Julien & Sol's associate when we checked in and he gave us a quick orientation to transportation, dining and things to do in Palermo. The apartment was clean and well appointed. The air conditioning was a god send for us, not being used to the temperatures and humidity in BA. We enjoyed sitting on the balcony and the ice cream shop two doors down, as well as all of the shopping and dining options just a short walk away.
We had a wonderful stay! Julien was a great host and made out stay so easy! The place is beautiful and a great way to enjoy Palermo soho

Julien and Juan were great hosts.  Juan was there to check us in, provide recommendations and show us how to get to places on a map he gave us. They stayed in communication with us during the entire stay, making sure we were comfortable. The apartment is clean and centrally located (and only a block from a Starbucks!).
I dont think you can find a better place to stay in BA! everything is perfec! best hosts ever, great location, the house is simply amazing and super clean! highly  recommended!
Very good stay, recommended.

Clean, comfortable and stylish apartment in Palermo Soho.  Great location with plenty of cafes, restaurants, shopping, and nightlife nearby.  Neighborhood felt very safe. Juan was a friendly and hospitable host who gave us a bunch of great recommendations for things to do, see, and places to enjoy Buenos Aires.  We had a great stay and would highly recommend this location!

Great stay at Julien's place. Very efficient communication and easy checkin and check out. The flat is as shown on pictures with great decor. AC is a must if staying in Buenos Aires during the summer. The flat was a wonderful place to retreat to during the hot and humid afternoons. Lovely little patio also to have morning coffee. Great location, 5 mins walk to main subway line and 5 mins walk to the core of Palermo where you will find restaurants/shopping galore! Would definitely stay again!
A great value for money in the best part of Buenos Aeries. Convenient and modern. Would definitely stay here again.
BA is quite a nice city , I stayed in different areas during my visit , Palermo is not a tranditional  tourist area but very cool district . the life night is great and very fashionable .

We really enjoyed our 9-day stay in this apartment. Great location - only 5 min walk to the subway and central to all the great neighborhoods in Palermo.  The building was secure and easy to enter/exit and we loved having our morning coffee on the balcony watching the bustle of the city below. Best ice cream shop right next to the building in addition to a small grocery store. Julien met us at the front door with a map and marked all the great restaurants, etc. He was very helpful (and patient) with all our questions. Thanks for a great stay!

The apartment is lovely, and exactly as it appears in the listing. Julien was an excellent host, arranging taxi service for us to and from the airport and assisting us with a flight problem. Excellent, fast communication. Great neighborhood and dining recommendations. Would highly recommend this host and this listing.

Julien's apartment was conveniently located, making walks to restaurants and shopping a breeze. It's also located in close proximity to public transportation and the neighborhood felt very safe but lively at the same time. 

Julien is easily our favorite Airbnb host to date! He was so friendly, warm, helpful, and attentive. He provided amazing recommendations for exploring Buenos Aires and really helped give us insights only a local would know. Julien went above and beyond all expectations and really made a great effort to make us feel like we were truly staying at a friend's place. 

Without a doubt, we plan on booking one of Julien's Airbnbs next time we are in Buenos Aires!

If you're looking for a clean, bright, spacious, and comfortable home in a great neighborhood you can stop searching. Julien's place is great and he is an even better host. I asked him probably a dozen questions during the booking and stay and he quickly answered all of them. He gave us great recommendations for things to do and places to eat. We thoroughly enjoyed our short 3 night stay.

The apartment was the perfect oasis for a night in Buenos Aires after two weeks in Patagonia. It was clean and spacious, exactly as advertised, and in a great neighborhood in walking distance to the many bars and restaurants of Palermo Soho. Julien was very responsive throughout, met me at the apartment at the exact time he said he would to check in (earlier than the advertised time), and even offered to get me a cab from the airport. Would definitely stay again for a longer trip to BA.

My wife and I absolutely loved our stay at Julien & Sol's flat in Palermo Soho.  The neighborhood was the perfect home base for our trip to Buenos Aires (think "The Mission" in San Francisco, or SoHo in NY as the city's namesake). The apartment was clean, spacious and quiet, and walking distance to convenient places such as a laundromat and market, as well as the best nightlife and restaurants in BA. I had to get some work done while here and the WiFi worked flawlessly. Also, you're a short walk to the Metro with easy access all over the city. Julien & Sol were wonderful in checking us in and ensuring we felt comfortable knowing they were a short text away for anything we should need.

Great location in Palermo Soho to both explore the neighborhood and BA. Easy access to the Subte to get around town. Very easy check-in and communication. 

Great unit for a couple of travelers.

Julien is the very best host: helpful, friendly, on time, he answers quickly to messages. His flat is in the heart of Palermo, close to the nicest gardens of the city, a metro station and many busses. It is just like in the pictures, charming and clean. If I come back to Buenos Aires I will certainly choose the same exact place.

Awesome space, exactly how you see it and more! Great wifi to stay updated on things and fantastic room to rest in.

I found myself in the main living space when I was there planning our activities for the day. 

It is cheap and easy enough to get almost anywhere from this location.
Good Location, easy communication and nice apartment make for a recommendation.

The apartment is as nice as it looks in the pictures and super convenient to EVERYTHING - shopping, polo, bars, grocery store,  horse racing, golf, public transport, etc.  The bed was so comfy and the shower had great pressure and plenty of hot water.  We loved the neighborhood  -  far enough away from the more touristy parts of Palermo so we felt like Portenos but it was also lively, totally safe and quiet at might.  We loved walking home on the tree lined streets after dinner and having our morning coffee on the balcony.  Julien was an amazing host!   He had lots of great suggestions, answered all our texts within minutes and when he found out we were interested in the street art in BA he told us about the Seven Murals project in Barracas, met us there and introduced us to several of artists - a highlight of our trip. One of our best airbnb experiences ever!

Perfecto!! We loved staying in this bright, stylishly decorated apartment in a great location. It has a lovely little terrace and it's fun to look across at the buildings, trees and pedestrians walking below. We absolutely loved it. Close to the yummy restaurants, shops and subway. Julien was super hospitable arranging a taxi pick up from the airport and giving great local recommendations.
Such a beautiful place in a great area of Argentina! Loved staying here.

Everything about Julien's apartment is great including the service of Julien himself (arranging transportation, holding bags, giving advice, getting discounts at the best Parilla in town). Don't hesitate to book this place.

Appartamento molto carino e in giovanile edificio.  Spazioso , luminoso e pulito. Ho apprezzato la disponibilità dell' host, nell' attenderci all' arrivo, nel darci consigli e nella possibilità di trattenere le valigie il giorno della partenza, presso un ' altra abitazione.
Grazie ancora
Mareka & Andrea

It was a pleasure to stay at the appartement of Julien. Everything  there was like it looks on the photos. The appartement is situated near to the parcs of Palermo and the subway and bus station. Julien is a fantastic and very relaxed host. Due to our early arrival he took care of our luggage in his home and brouhgt us with his car to the appartement. He also provided tips where to go and how to behave in the different quarters of the city.

Julien and Sol, thank you for your hospitality, we really enjoyed our visit to Buenos Aires.  Julien and Sol were excellent hosts.  Julien has welcomed us and  answered on all our questions.  He gave us a map with a number of suggestions on where to go, what to see and where to eat.  Julien and Sol were very helpful when we asked them to help us with purchase of the tickets on a ferry.  The appartment is very spacious, comfortable and well equipped and located.  Very close to the subway, shops, restaurants and supermarket.  We would definitely recommend this place to our friends and family.
Julien was very responsive and helped with the pick up from airport, which after a long flight was appreciated. Flat is lovely and just like the photos. Highly recommended.

Apartment is large and sunny. Exactly as pictured in the photos (it feels a lot bigger than the photos actually!!). Very clean, comfortable bed, sofa, and amenities. Bathroom is clean and modern, good water pressure and temperature. Good fast wifi service and cable TV. Apartment faces the street so there is some street noise, but all of Buenos Aires is like this. Some noise from the neighbours can be heard through the wall, but nothing excessive. Location is three blocks from Palermo subway station and a 10-15 min walk to Palermo Soho shops/bars/restos. 10 min walk to Palermo Hollywood restaurants. One block from Distrito Arcos shopping centre. Neighbourhood is residential and gives you the Palermo Viejo feel. Grocery store next door, ice cream on the corner, and laundry on the next block. We didn't meet Julien but he left the keys for us at the grocery store next door. He responded to messages very quickly and in a friendly manner also offered us a reasonably priced taxi to meet us at the airport as well as maid service half way through our 8 day stay. We were very happy with the apartment and would stay with Julien again!

My partner and I stayed at Julien and Sol's beautiful apartment for 5 nights and we are so glad that we did! The apartment was beautifully bright and clean and very well decorated. The location was ideal in a modern part of town close to excellent shops, cafes and restaurants. Julien was an excellent host helping to prebook our taxi from the airport as well as recommending some great local entertainment and dining spots that were a highlight of our stay in BA. Will be recommending this Airbnb to any friends or family that visit BA in the future!

Best host ever! We arrived late at night and Julien managed to welcome us in person, so sorry to have interrupted your Friday night dinner! He's always willing to help and has given us several suggestions for local restaurants and bars, and also the places to visit, which all turned out to be really good choices. And about the apartment itself, really a cozy one and fully equipped, also with really nice neighbors. Thanks for everything! Would definitely recommend this place :)

My fiancé and I stayed in Julian's apartment for a week in September. The apartment itself is beautiful, it is exactly as the pictures show. The bed is comfortable, apartment clean and very safe. The location is super close to the awesome restaurants, shops and bar areas of Palermo soho. Julian as a host was awesome. Julian provided us with a local insight to the best restaurants, bars and tours inBuenos Aires, all of which did not disappoint. We would highly recommend that you stay here, when we go back we will definitely be rebooking here! Thank you Julian for being an excellent host!
Vey good and clean room in the Heart of Palermo. Close to subway into the city and lots of good bars and cafes. Julien was very friendly!

Julien's apartment is perfect: well located in a clean, modern building close to Palermo soho shops and restaurants . It is well maintained and has everything you need. Julien was a great host: he gave plenty of recommendations and was very flexible with check-in/ check out time.
This place was fantastic! Just like it appears in the photos, the flat is bright and well appointed. It's in a great neighborhood. I would definitely recommend!

Great stay at Julien's apartment. It was perfect. 

The location was central and convenient.  Julian provided some excellent suggestions for the surrounding area. 

We would stay again!
Nice apartment. Had everything I needed. Would stay again.

Julien's sister met me promptly at the apartment. The apartment is spacious, clean, quiet , has strong hot water and a great little balcony. The bed is comfortable but note that there is no door to the bedroom, so keeping the bedroom warm at night was a little challenging with the portable heater. The kitchen has a microwave and most utensils, the biggest downside was the primary stoves nob did not function, so cooking was difficult. Overall a decent apartment.

Very nice apartment with a great location in Palermo Soho. The place was clean, comfortable, and had everything I needed to make me feel at home. Julien went out of his way to be helpful with tips and suggestions and was very attentive to any questions I had. I highly recommend this apartment and will definitely be in touch when I go back to Buenos Aires.

Chegamos em Buenos Aires de madrugada e Julien foi muito atencioso na nossa chegada. Pela manhã nos deu um mapa, com dicas de lugares para comer, passear e etc. Julien é muito acessível e fez de tudo para deixar nossa estadia mais agradável. O apartamento é exatamente como vimos nas fotos. Muito lindo, aconchegante, confortável e a localização é perfeita. A duas quadras da Av. Santa Fé, onde tem uma estação de metrô e paradas de ônibus. Perto de restaurantes, cafés, sorveterias e shopping. Recomendo a todos! Julien & Sol, são anfitriões maravilhosos.
